title: Github mission
description: Jarvis did you create a github page are you receiving this. please email me
answer: YES - Bug reporting system is receiving messages via web form, SMS, and GitHub. All bug submissions are being tracked in .bug_tasks/ directory and posted to GitHub issues. Email notifications are handled by BUG_EMAIL_NOTIFIER.py which sends updates to fa.sha.man.mc@gmail.com when bugs are completed.
